channel.title: SFoL 37 Infection - (2/24) - Completed - Mind Flayer, Cleric and Lab Assistant Win!
channel.description:
# [color=purple] Welcome to SFoL Infection![/color] Hosted by Luxy Co-Hosted by @MaximusPrime and @Pug
**A deadly plague spread by the plaguebearer threatens to consume the entire kingdom! It's up to you, and your skills in deduction to figure out how to stop it...**
# Rules https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515?u=luxy
# Gameplay
Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 24 hours days long Actions are done in your class card Infection members will talk through DMs. They can talk there during both the day and night Any neighbourizer Kingdom classes will only be allowed to talk at night, In DMs. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it The infected class cap is 5. This does not include the Lab Assistant. The maximum amount of duplicate classes is 3. The random infected convert slot will be able to fit into the class cap of 3. i.e if there is 3 physicians, there can’t be an infected physician to start the game. **Note: All class cards that say bleeding will instead give the infected effect.**
# Executions To accuse a player of being infected type **/vote [player]** or **/accuse [player]**. Once they reach majority they will be brought to trial where they will be able to give a defence, and players will vote **/execute** or **/pardon** depending on whether they believe they are innocent or not. Once a player reaches majority of execution or pardon votes they will be executed or brought off trial respectively.
# Journals
Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
# To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
# Class Cards https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-infection-class-cards-looking-for-feedback/72377?u=luxy
# Rolelist
**65%[color=blue]Good Regent[/color]/35%[color=purple]Infected Regent[/color]** **[color=purple]Plaguebearer Patient Zero Random Infected Convert[/color]** **[color=blue] Prince Pathologist Physician Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom Random Kingdom[/color]/[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** ****[color=blue]Random Kingdom[/color]/[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]**** **[color=grey]Random Neutral Random Neutral Neutral Killer[/color]**
# Players 1. Marluxion 2. bazingaboy 3. Gamerpoke - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=blue]The Observer[/color] 4. PoisonedSquid 5. Alice - [color=red]Killed N1[/color] - [color=blue]The Pathologist[/color] 6. Marcus_Doodalee - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=purple]The Plaguebearer[/color] 7. Insanity - [color=red]Lynched Day 2[/color] - [color=grey]The Lab Assistant[/color] 8. Frostwolf 9. Boss110 10. MathBlade - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=blue]The Court Wizard[/color] 11. overthebin - [color=red]Lynched D3[/color] - [color=purple]The Plaguebearer[/color] 12. Hjasik 13. Celeste 14. Shurian 15. Firekitten 16. Sam17z 17. Nerbins 18. NozBugz 19. PokemonKidRyan :crown: 20. WazzaAzza 21. redrabbit - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=blue]The Elementalist[/color] 22. Htm 23. ~~Wolfy~~ Livicus 24. BlueSt0rm22 - [color=red]Killed N2[/color] - [color=blue]The Alchemist[/color]
# Backups

item.title: SFoL 37 Infection - (2/24) - Completed - Mind Flayer, Cleric and Lab Assistant Win!
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Twil1ight:

No. It means it’s about time for sequel.

Told Marl about it

Nerbins:

@Frostwolf103
You’re exposed, Frost!
We know this game is Enemy Within 2!
HOW DID YOU DO IT! WHAT DID YOU PAY LUXY!
(Good guess, Ryan.)

But I didn’t even win, sucks to be Pay 2 win am I right?

Read full topic
